original_text: We have plenty of grass and food for the camels. And there is a room for you to stay with us for the night.’
korean_text: 또 이르되 우리에게 짚과 사료가 족하며 유숙할 곳도 있나이다

sentences.original_text: And there is a room for you
to stay with us for the night.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리와 함께 밤을 지낼 수 있는.
